headline: Delta Air Lines (DAL): Rethinking Valuation After a Strong Recent Share Price Rally
summary: Delta Air Lines (DAL) has quietly outperformed many travel peers lately, with the stock up about 19% over the past month and 16% in the past 3 months, drawing fresh attention from value minded investors. See our latest analysis for Delta Air Lines. That recent surge sits on top of an 18.39% year to date share price return and a robust three year total shareholder return of 109.50%, hinting that investors are steadily warming to Delta’s earnings power and resilience. If Delta’s run has you...

headline: Idaho Supports Trump’s Aviation Choice — Senator Risch, Confirm Captain Anderson Now
summary: Boise, Idaho, Dec. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Experienced Pilots Advancing Safety (EPAS), a national organization of professional aviators committed to strengthening America’s aviation safety and global leadership, is urging Senator James Risch, Chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee to advance President Donald J.
